ops.description: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:4, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Aeris}
“This sounds like fun.
Come on {Cloud}, let's do it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Tifa}
“Sounds like fun.
Come on {Cloud},
let's give it a try.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Yuffie}
“I don't know what it's all about but
sounds kind of cool.
Wanna try it, {Cloud}?”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:0}); // “Sorry but there's no show now.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:6}); // “You are our 100th couple today…
Oh, wait…no you're not…
Sorry.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:5}); // “You are our 100th couple today!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:7}); // “You two will play the leads
in tonight's show!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:9}); // “Oh, now, it's not hard. Just play
it however you want to and the rest
of the cast will cover up for you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // “Geez, what a jerk.
Why don't you just leave us alone?”

But not today, so come back
again sometime and see it.”

dialogStrings:
“We put on a really unusual show here.
But not today, so come back
again sometime and see it.”

“What's your problem?
Can't you see we wanna be alone?”

“Geez, what a jerk.
Why don't you just leave us alone?”

“You are our 100th couple today…
Oh, wait…no you're not…
Sorry.”

“You two will play the leads
in tonight's show!!”

“Oh, now, it's not hard. Just play
it however you want to and the rest
of the cast will cover up for you.”

{Aeris}
“This sounds like fun.
Come on {Cloud}, let's do it.”

{Tifa}
“Sounds like fun.
Come on {Cloud},
let's give it a try.”

{Yuffie}
“I don't know what it's all about but
sounds kind of cool.
Wanna try it, {Cloud}?”
